docs.lead_paragraph: New Mexico authorities have released 911 audio from a victim in a three-state crime rampage that included the killings of the suspect's girlfriend and a cleaning wman at a church.

headline.print_headline: Authorities Release 911 Call From Multi-State Crime Rampage
headline.main: Authorities Release 911 Call From Multi-State Crime Rampage

docs.snippet: New Mexico authorities have released 911 audio from a victim in a three-state crime rampage that included the killings of the suspect's girlfriend and a cleaning wman at a church....

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. officials didn't seize thousands of pounds of imported rat meat prior to the Super Bowl and they never issued a warning saying restaurants and food stores could be selling it as chicken wings, despite reports shared widely on multiple websites.

headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: FDA Didn't Warn About Rat-Meat Chicken Wings
headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: FDA Didn't Warn About Rat-Meat Chicken Wings

docs.snippet: U.S. officials didn't seize thousands of pounds of imported rat meat prior to the Super Bowl and they never issued a warning saying restaurants and food stores could be selling it as chicken wings, despite reports shared widely on multiple website...

docs.lead_paragraph: An Ohio prosecutor has filed a motion to try as an adult a 14-year-old girl charged with killing her father.

docs.lead_paragraph: A United Nations official who visited North Dakota in the wake of months of protests over the Dakota Access pipeline believes the concerns and rights of Native Americans haven't been adequately addressed.

headline.main: UN Official: Tribe Not Properly Heard in Pipeline Dispute

docs.lead_paragraph: Police say an 18-year-old Connecticut college student has died after falling from the roof of a building that houses a bar.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nineteen attorneys general have signed onto a brief to the Supreme Court in support of a transgender teenager who wants to use the boys' bathroom at his Virginia high school, New York's chief law enforcement officer said Friday.

headline.print_headline: Attorneys General Support Transgender Boy in US Court Case
headline.main: Attorneys General Support Transgender Boy in US Court Case

docs.lead_paragraph: The Syrian opposition has provisionally accepted 12 principles given to delegates by the United Nations at the end of an eight-day round of peace talks, chief negotiator Nasr al-Hariri said.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Opposition Accepts U.N. Principles at End of Peace Talks
headline.main: Syrian Opposition Accepts U.N. Principles at End of Peace Talks
